review: The fire stick connected to the net very easily and I was streaming movies in no time. The remote is very responsive. I am able to surf movies without hesitation. It seems to be built well and has a good feel when I press the buttons on the control. I am satisfied with this unit at this time.
author: joseph pullano

review: Love the ease of use and versatility, as well as the number of shows/apps we're able to get!
author: Amazon Customer

review: I already own and use three Roku's. Not the Roku stick . My Roku's are full of channels to watch , most free. Lots of programming in every category ie. Children , movies, news , religion , music ...most FREE. Not true with the Fire TV Stick . Very limited stuff, most you have to pay for.
author: Richard E.

review: Very convenient to use for amazon instant video since my tv and DVD player only offer Hulu and Netflix.I was a bit disappointed that you need to connect the stick to AC power as I thought it operated like a flash drive. I believe it will but it is "recommended" you connect it to power and mine wouldn't work until I did. I only bring this up because it is one more wire to deal with with a wall mounted television setup. Also the AC block is a little wider than the average plug so it doesn't easily fit alongside the other plugs plugged into the surge protectorAlso disappointed that the voice remote app is still not available for iPhone. Waiting patiently for that, because I don't like having to arrow through letters to type in movies I'm searching for etc.Great that it already comes registered to me and linked to my prime account so no need to setup that up.I ordered this as a prime member during the $19 special and it was well worth the money.
author: Frostsdad

review: It works well enough. I'm sure they'll work out the little bugs, like when watching streaming video when you pause the sound at that instant stays playing on a very fast loop -- pause should also mute but it doesn't do that.  Wish it had more configuration options and more things you can tweak in the options/preferences, such as streaming from local content on my streaming server.  Otherwise it's fairly decent.
author: J. Payne "Home Theater Nut"

review: The Fire TV Stick is easy to use and very portable.  As long as you know your passwords, it is simple to set up after plugging it into your tv.  I couldn't be happier.
author: Catherine Sloat

review: So far it was very easy to install , update and start using it. I use Netflix and Amazon prime and so far it is as good as any of the competitors.I think the remote is small and simple but does the job well. Better then expected , I'm happy with this product.I find the interface clean and clear , keyboard on screen is hard to use but it is as any other similar product.So for the price I think it is a great product.
author: Eduardohers

review: It's great for Netflix and Hulu but won't load Amazon Prime movies or tv shows. Worked for 1 day.
